EmailTemplate.name: Buyer Dead Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Please provide us your feedback - Five Star Professional
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.First_Name__c}
This year you have not yet certified to receive your Five Star Award.
We would like to understand why you have decided not to certify to receive this years award and what we can improve to better serve you in the future. Please complete the following 1-minute survey.
Click here to begin survey or copy/paste the web link below:
https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/5180307/?id={!Opportunity.SF_ID__c}
Your feedback is very valued and appreciated!
Dylan Campbell | Assistant Sales Operations Manager Five Star Professional 651-259-1111 dylan.campbell@fivestarprofessional.com www.fivestarprofessional.com
